content.content: 1. (1) Every arbitrator shall, within 10 days after issuing an award, file a copy of the award with the Minister in the form specified by the Minister. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1. (2) The Minister shall publish the copies of awards filed under subsection (1) or otherwise make them available to the public. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1. (3) For greater certainty, the Minister may satisfy the obligation set out in subsection (2) by publishing the copies on a Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) Every arbitrator shall, within 10 days after issuing an award, file a copy of the award with the Minister in the form specified by the Minister. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1.

(2) The Minister shall publish the copies of awards filed under subsection (1) or otherwise make them available to the public. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1.

(3) For greater certainty, the Minister may satisfy the obligation set out in subsection (2) by publishing the copies on a Government of Ontario website. O. Reg. 482/18, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) The following rules relate to the filing of schedules of fees by arbitrators: 1. An arbitrator who has not already filed a schedule with the Minister shall do so on being appointed. 2. A person who is named to the list of approved arbitrators established by the Minister and has not already filed a schedule with the Minister shall do so on being named to the list. 3. A person may file a schedule with the Minister even if the person is not required to do so. 4. A person may file a schedule to replace a schedule filed earlier.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (1). (2) On being appointed, an arbitrator shall provide the parties with a copy of the schedule of fees that he or she filed most recently under subsection (1).  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (2). (3) An arbitrator shall not charge fees except in accordance with the schedule he or she filed most recently under subsection (1).  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (3). (4) Paragraph 1 of subsection (1) and subsections (2) and (3) do not apply to a member of a board of arbitration other than the chair.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (4).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The following rules relate to the filing of schedules of fees by arbitrators:

1. An arbitrator who has not already filed a schedule with the Minister shall do so on being appointed.

2. A person who is named to the list of approved arbitrators established by the Minister and has not already filed a schedule with the Minister shall do so on being named to the list.

3. A person may file a schedule with the Minister even if the person is not required to do so.

4. A person may file a schedule to replace a schedule filed earlier.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (1).

(2) On being appointed, an arbitrator shall provide the parties with a copy of the schedule of fees that he or she filed most recently under subsection (1).  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (2).

(3) An arbitrator shall not charge fees except in accordance with the schedule he or she filed most recently under subsection (1).  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (3).

(4) Paragraph 1 of subsection (1) and subsections (2) and (3) do not apply to a member of a board of arbitration other than the chair.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 2 (4).

content.content: 3. (1) In this section, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in Schedule 1.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (1). (2) A statement filed with the Board under section 89 of the Act shall be in Form 1.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (2). (3) A notice filed with the Board under section 94 of the Act shall be in Form 2.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (3). (4) A determination of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 96 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 3.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (4). (5) An order of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 99 (10) of the Act shall be in Form 4.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (5). (6) A direction of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under section 102 or subsection 144 (4) of the Act shall be in Form 5.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (6). (7) A copy of a decision of an arbitrator or arbitration board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 48 (19) of the Act shall be in Form 6.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (7). (8) A declaration under subsection 165 (4) of the Act by an employer bargaining agency or employers’ organization shall be in Form 7.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (8). (9) A declaration under section 165 (4) of the Act by an employee bargaining agency or affiliated bargaining agent shall be in Form 8.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (9). (10) A copy of a decision of an arbitration board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 48 (19) of the Act, as made applicable by subsection 103 (8) of the Act, shall be in Form 9.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (10).
content.raw_html:
3. (1) In this section, when a form is referred to by number, the reference is to the form with that number that is described in Schedule 1.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (1).

(2) A statement filed with the Board under section 89 of the Act shall be in Form 1.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (2).

(3) A notice filed with the Board under section 94 of the Act shall be in Form 2.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (3).

(4) A determination of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 96 (6) of the Act shall be in Form 3.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (4).

(5) An order of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 99 (10) of the Act shall be in Form 4.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (5).

(6) A direction of the Board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under section 102 or subsection 144 (4) of the Act shall be in Form 5.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (6).

(7) A copy of a decision of an arbitrator or arbitration board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 48 (19) of the Act shall be in Form 6.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (7).

(8) A declaration under subsection 165 (4) of the Act by an employer bargaining agency or employers’ organization shall be in Form 7.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (8).

(9) A declaration under section 165 (4) of the Act by an employee bargaining agency or affiliated bargaining agent shall be in Form 8.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (9).

(10) A copy of a decision of an arbitration board for filing in the Superior Court of Justice under subsection 48 (19) of the Act, as made applicable by subsection 103 (8) of the Act, shall be in Form 9.  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 3 (10).

content.content: 4. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 94/07, s. 4. Schedule 1
